StudentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StudentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StudentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Transfer_Monitoring_Date_Data.description: Student who's Financial Aid Transfer Monitoring Date to update

OPEID_BranchObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

OPEID_BranchObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

OPEID_BranchObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Transfer_Monitoring_Date_Data.description: OPEID Branch Code for the Records to be updated
New Financial Aid Transfer Monitoring Date for the student, if left blank or omitted, it will clear the student's Transfer Monitoring Date

description: Wrapper element for Student Transfer Monitoring Date Data

validation.validation: Student has more than one active Academic Record. Please include the OPEID Branch Code Reference to filter. Please use version v30.0 or greater if the field is not available.
